title: How to Make Non Paraffin Based Dipping Chocolate

steps.title: If you have a double boiler, use it to melt the chocolate and the oil together.
steps.content: If you have a double boiler, use it to melt the chocolate and the oil together.

steps.title: Put oil and chocolate chips in top of double boiler together.
steps.content: Put oil and chocolate chips in top of double boiler together. The object is to melt all the chocolate at the same time, slowly, with little disturbance until melted, then gentle but constant stirring until well blended and semi liquid.

steps.title: Alternatively, heat water to boiling in a saucepan.
steps.content: Alternatively, heat water to boiling in a saucepan.

steps.title: Turn off the heat and insert bowl with chocolate bits into the saucepan.
steps.content: Turn off the heat and insert bowl with chocolate bits into the saucepan.

steps.title: Stir carefully over the hot water being sure that the oil is mixed in very thoroughly.
steps.content: Stir carefully over the hot water being sure that the oil is mixed in very thoroughly.

steps.title: Cool gradually for some minutes, stirring slowly.
steps.content: Cool gradually for some minutes, stirring slowly.

steps.title: Dip candy or cookies, allow to set and dry in a cool room for a few hours.
steps.content: Dip candy or cookies, allow to set and dry in a cool room for a few hours.
